import React, {useState} from 'react' import Link from 'next/Link' const perguntas = 'font-bold' const box = 'p-4 block shadow bg-blue-100 my-2 rounded' const Pesquisa = () =>{ const [ form, setForm ] = useState({ Nome:'teste', Email : 'ok', Whatsapp : 'isso' }) const save = async () =>{ try{ const response = await fetch('/api/save', { method : 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(form) }) const data = await response.json() console.log(data) }catch(err){} } const onChange = evt=>{ const cache = evt.target.value const key = evt.target.name setForm(old => ({ ...old, [key]: cache })) } return(
